Test Name: Hemophilia B, F9 Gene, Next-Generation Sequencing
Specimen Type: Genomic DNA extracted from peripheral blood or buccal swab
Purpose: To identify genetic variations within the F9 gene that may contribute to Hemophilia B.
Equipment: Next-generation sequencing platform (e.g., Illumina MiSeq or Ion Torrent), Agilent 2100 Bioanalyzer, PCR thermocycler
